definition: to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem

sentences.english: During the past couple weeks, gold has had the Midas Touch.
sentences.chinese: 在過去幾周裏，黃金煥發着其點石成金的魅力。

sentences.english: The fable of King Midas is about a man who could turn things to gold.
sentences.chinese: 邁達斯國王的神話說的是一個能點石成金的人。
